import React, { Fragment, useState } from 'react'; import PropTypes from 'prop-types'; import { connect } from 'react-redux'; const CreateProfile = ()=>{ const [form, setForm] = useState({ company: '', website: '', location: '', status: '', skills: '', githubusername: '', bio: '', twitter: '', facebook: '', linkedin: '', youtube: '', instagram: '' }); // Create destructuring const { company, website, location, status, skills, githubusername, bio, twitter, facebook, linkedin, youtube, instagram } = form; //state unutk toggle sosmed cosnt [togle, setTogle] = useState(false); return(

Create Your Profile

Let's get some information to make your profile stand out

* = required field
Give us an idea of where you are at in your career
Could be your own company or one you work for
Could be your own or a company website
City & state suggested (eg. Boston, MA)
Please use comma separated values (eg. HTML,CSS,JavaScript,PHP)
If you want your latest repos and a Github link, include your username
Tell us a little about yourself
Optional
Membuat route untuk component CreateProfile /> Buka file App.js
Go Back
) } CreateProfile.propTypes = { } export default CreateProfile;
